Mike Pence Jim Jordan ( R-Ohio), chairman of the Republican Study Committee( RSC), says Republicans have to seize their opportunity to pass legislation that would significantly lower the nation's record deficit. I think the next six months, between now and the end of July as we go into the August recess, as we go through[ debates on] the continuing resolution, the budget, debt ceiling, appropriations... will largely define the whole political landscape as we move into 2012, Jim Jordan said in a sit-down interview with The Hill.
